Name: Zoning, Bronx Metro North Station Area Study, Bronx (C 240163 MMX)
Title: Application number C 240163 MMX (Bronx Metro-North Station Area Study) submitted by 1601 Bronxdale Property Owner LLC pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter for an amendment to the City Map involving: the establishment of Pierce Avenue west of Bronxdale Avenue; and the adjustment of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby; including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 13150 dated January 20, 2024 and signed by the Borough President, Borough of the Bronx, Community Districts 9, 10 & 11, Council Districts 13, 17, and 18.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
